channel.title: Histograms on Edward Chavis's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Histograms on Edward Chavis's blog

item.title: Histograms
item.description: library(sqldf) library(Lahman) library(devtools) library(ggplot2) # extracting the data------------------------------------------ query<-"SELECT weight FROM Master" result<-sqldf(query) #visualization------------------------------------------------- ggplot()+ geom_histogram(data=result,aes(x=weight),color="blue",fill="white",size=1,bins=100)+ ggtitle("Baseball Player Wheight Distribution")
